title.narrative: OUTPUT 6.3: Communication for Development (C4D) - COMMUNICATION FOR DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Communities adopt evidence-informed behavior necessary for child survival, development and protection., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, children, especially the poorest, the most excluded and those affected by crisis, have access to child-sensitive and shock- responsive social services, benefit from positive community practices and are empowered to be agents of change within their communities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Communities adopt evidence-informed behavior necessary for child survival, development and protection.

[Number of sector-based C4D strategies based on evidence developed and implemented at national, provincial and local level.] Nombre des stratgies C4D sectoriels bases sur les vidences labores et mise en uvre au niveau national, provincial et local.

Number of RCCE messages produced and disseminated with UNICEF support, adapted for target groups, in the reporting year [COVID] viii) Integrating content and community engagement actions to strengthen trust and social cohesion

Number of RCCE messages produced and disseminated with UNICEF support, adapted for target groups, in the reporting year [COVID] vi) Built on feedback received from concerned populations to adapt to their concerns and context

[Number of provincial communication task forces that have implemented a capacity development plan for C4D partners at the provincial and local level to ensure the coordination, implementation and monitoring of C4D interventions.] Nombre des task-forces communication provinciales ayant mise en uvre un plan de dveloppement des capacits des partenaires en C4D du niveau provincial, intermdiaire el locale en vue d'assurer la coordination, la mise en uvre et le suivi des interventions C4D.

[Number of studies / social research conducted / supported in the field of C4D in development or humanitarian situations] Nombre d'tude/recherche sociale conduites / appuyes dans le domaine de C4D en situation de dveloppement ou humanitaire.

[Number of Community Animation Units (CAC) that implement a minimum package of activities aimed at individual and collective change and the generation of demand for basic social services with the participation of women and adolescents] Nombre des Cellule d'Animation Communautaires (CAC) qui mettent en uvre un paquet minimum d'activits visant le changement individuel et collective et la gnration de la demande de services sociaux de base avec la participation des femmes et des adolescents.

[Percentage of mass campaigns or responses to emergencies with C4D strategies based on evidence and social data developed and implemented.] Pourcentage de campagnes de masse ou rponses aux urgences avec des stratgies C4D bases sur des vidences et des donnes sociales dveloppes et mises en uvre.
